caption:
The photograph depicts an engaging and somewhat contrasting scene, featuring four individuals playing golf in the foreground, against an industrial backdrop. The setting includes a vividly blue sky and is framed by dark silhouette pine branches at the top, adding a natural framing element to the composition.

Foreground:
- Four people are shown; three men and one woman. They are in various golfing stancesâ€”one appears to be taking a shot while the others watch. Their attire is typical of golfers, including caps and casual golfing clothes.

Middle ground:
- There's a vibrant green golf course that serves as a playing area for the individuals. This patch of green is lush and well-maintained, running slightly uphill.

Background:
- The industrial scene in the distance is marked by a large chimney emitting a billowing cloud of white smoke which stands out against the blue sky. A spherical, orange-colored structure, possibly a gas holder, adds a pop of color against the grayscale industrial equipment. Additional smoke plumes and structures suggest ongoing industrial activity.

This juxtaposition of leisurely and industrial elements within one frame creates a visually striking image that contrasts human relaxation and industrial activity. The presence of nature, industry, and recreation all in one view prompts reflection on their coexistence.
title: Smokestack of Weyerhauser-Kraft pulp mill
